EmailTemplate.subject: See you at Trance Nation!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
We look forward to partying the night away with you.
Flash this email for the ultimate hook up. Stop by the Martell Bar and head to the “Follow The Swift Counter” to pick up your party kit and a free cocktail on us.
You can also redeem your NCF coupon at the Martell Bar.
Your NCF Coupon:
